      • getChannel

        public org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel getChannel()
        Returns the underlying netty channel. This method is intended be used for access to netty to get additional details when processing the request and may be used by plugins. Responses should be sent using the methods defined in this class and not directly on the channel.
        Returns:
        underlying netty channel
